00036   HcalBoardsConn(int connector_pin, string hbab, string hab, int asic_input , int analog_output) {
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , connector_pin  ) ;
00043 
00044     std::cout << "hbab: " << hbab << endl;
00045     if (hbab != "left" && hbab != "right") {
00046       std::cout << "Bad hbab string " << hbab << std:: endl; 
00047       std::cout << "Will exit program now " << std:: endl; 
00048       exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     //check for correct value of hbab string
00052     
00053     if ( hbab == "left" ) obj()->setIntVal( 1 , 0  ) ;
00054     if ( hbab == "right" ) obj()->setIntVal( 1 , 1  ) ;
00055     if (hab.length() != 1) {
00056       std::cout << "HcalBoardsConn: Bad hab string " << hab << std:: endl; 
00057       std::cout << "Will exit program now " << std:: endl; 
00058       exit(1);
00059     }
00060 
00061     //check for correct value of hab string
00062     char const* habIDS = "-ABCDEF"; 
00063     string::size_type habID = hab.find_first_of(habIDS);
00064     if ( habID == string::npos) {
00065       std::cout << "HcalBoardsConn: Bad hab ID " << hab << std:: endl; 
00066       std::cout << "Will exit program now " << std:: endl; 
00067       exit(1);
00068     }
00069  
00070     //Assign hardcoded the alphanumerical ids to the integer ids
00071     //Not very nice but what should we de ...
00072     //As long as it is in the class interface ....
00073     //for the left hbab
00074     if (hab == "-") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , -1  ) ;
00075     if (hbab == "left") {
00076       if (hab == "A") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 0  ) ;
00077       if (hab == "B") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 1  ) ;
00078       if (hab == "C") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 2  ) ;
00079       if (hab == "D") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 3  ) ;
00080       if (hab == "E") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 4  ) ;
00081       if (hab == "F") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 5  ) ;
00082     }
00083 
00084     //for the right hbab
00085     if (hbab == "right") {
00086       if (hab == "A") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 11  ) ;
00087       if (hab == "B") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 10  ) ;
00088       if (hab == "C") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 9  ) ;
00089       if (hab == "D") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 8  ) ;
00090       if (hab == "E") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 7  ) ;
00091       if (hab == "F") obj()->setIntVal( 2 , 6  ) ;
00092     }
00093 
00094     obj()->setIntVal( 3 , asic_input  ) ;
00095     obj()->setIntVal( 4 , analog_output  ) ;
00096 
00097 
00098   }

00112     string HbabID;

00114     if (obj()->getIntVal(1) == 1) HbabID = "right";
